item.title: 30DayMapChallenge 2025
item.description:
Points
Points

Infectious Diseases World Map - Average DALYs per country 1990-2021

Nov 1, 2025

Lines
Lines

Visualizing Global Connections Using Lines

Nov 2, 2025

Polygons
Polygons

Working with polygons and global projections

Nov 3, 2025

My Data
My Data

This map compares mortality rates across Italy, France, and Spain for four leading causes of death Alzheimers disease and other dementias, chronic obstructive pulmonary

Nov 4, 2025

Earth
Earth

Mapping Suicide Mortality Across the Planet, Age-standardized death rates due to suicide, 1990-2021

Nov 5, 2025

Dimensions
Dimensions

Exploring multidimensional health data through a composite index combining life expectancy, HALE, YLL, and YLD.

Nov 6, 2025

Accessibility
Accessibility

Exploring accessibility to healthcare facilities across Spain, highlighting spatial inequalities in travel time.

Nov 7, 2025

Urban
Urban

This map explores the heart of New York City a view of buildings, roads, and parks around Central Park, blending the citys structure and green spaces.

Nov 8, 2025

Analog
Analog

Scenographia Systematis Copernicani a scenographic representation of the Copernican World System. The heliocentric theory of Nicolaus Copernicus, published in 1543

Nov 9, 2025

Air
Air

Nov 10, 2025

Minimal
Minimal

A minimalist map of Italy created using sf and ggplot2 with soft tones and a single city highlighted.
